name: Lazy Kitten
description:
STOP PROCRASTINATING!

Lazy Kitten is currently still in development.  Please note that the Web version does not currently save your data.

Cute hand-drawn self-improvement app for procrastinators to achieve their goals and dreams!

✪ Set up to 5 goals to work on simultaneously!
✪ Track and manage hours spent on goals and work towards completion!
✪ Visualize progress in a dynamic Radar Chart!
✪ Keep track of completed / terminated goals!

(To be) Available on iOS, MacOS & Windows.

CONTROLS

Currently optimized for mobile devices.

If you're on a Mac or PC, use your mouse to navigate through Lazy Kitten!

CREDITS
  • Two Pigs Studio (@twopigs.studio)
  • TsucchiDev (@tsucchi.dev) - Developer
  • BloomandJen (@bloomandjen) -  Artist
  • Oneul274 (@oneul274) - Composer
FEEDBACK WELCOME

As this is the FIRST BUILD of Lazy Kitten, we're going to need all the feedback we can get to help with further development.  Please let us know if you find any bugs for us to squash or things that annoy you when using the application!  Thanks a lot!

CONTACT / FOLLOW US!

Follow us on Instagram @twopigs.studio / Twitter @twopigsstudio or join us at Two Pigs Studio Discord Server to join us on our game development journey with regular game development progress and making art for games!  A DM on instagram / discord would be the easiest way to reach us.  You may also contact us at twopigs.studio@gmail.com.
